channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-24693|2024-09-20T14:45:54.008Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20rooms%20client%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper access control in the installer for Zoom Rooms Client for Windows before version 5.17.5 may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2023-36538|2024-09-20T13:51:25.061Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20rooms%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper access control in Zoom Rooms for Windows before version 5.15.0 may allow an authenticated user to enable an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2023-49647|2024-09-20T14:52:01.494Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20windows%2C%20zoom%20vdi%20client%20for%20windows%2C%20and%20zoom%20sdks%20for%20windows%20before%20version%205.16.10
item.description: Improper access control in Zoom Desktop Client for Windows, Zoom VDI Client for Windows, and Zoom SDKs for Windows before version 5.16.10 may allow an authenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-24690|2024-09-20T14:50:06.835Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Improper input validation in some Zoom clients may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-24691|2024-09-20T14:48:21.535Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20windows%2C%20zoom%20vdi%20client%20for%20windows%2C%20and%20zoom%20meeting%20sdk%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper input validation in Zoom Desktop Client for Windows, Zoom VDI Client for Windows, and Zoom Meeting SDK for Windows may allow an unauthenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-49646|2024-09-20T14:53:41.733Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Improper authentication in some Zoom clients before version 5.16.5 may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-43588|2024-09-20T14:58:08.976Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Insufficient control flow management in some Zoom clients may allow an authenticated user to conduct an information disclosure via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-24694|2024-08-13T13:31:27.006Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper privilege management in the installer for Zoom Desktop Client for Windows before version 5.17.10 may allow an authenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27247|2024-07-25T14:38:27.038Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20macos
item.description: Improper privilege management in the installer for Zoom Desktop Client for macOS before version 5.17.10 may allow a privileged user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27244|2024-06-06T15:21:25.196Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20workplace%20vdi%20app%20for%20windows
item.description: Insufficient verification of data authenticity in the installer for Zoom Workplace VDI App for Windows may allow an authenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.description: Buffer overflow in some Zoom Workplace Apps and SDK’s may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.
